overview:
Saiju is Chief Executive of Oztern Technology, responsible for leading the companyâ€™s day-to-day operations and ensuring operational excellence company-wide.

Almost a decade long association with the field of IT, Saiju has a blend of technology & business consulting experience in countries like US, UK & India, with global organizations including Fortune 500 companies Baxter Health Care and Allstate Insurance. Saiju has a mission to promote cloud computing in organizations in addition to managing the operations of OzTern.

Saiju holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science and Post graduate degree in Computer Applications.
